reviewText: If you love telenovelas, you shouldn't miss La Mentira (The Lie). Great chemistry between the protagonists, great acting and engaging story, though a little far fetched, as many novelas are.
Title: N/A

reviewText: Let me preface this by stating that "La Mentira" is my all time favorite soap. The soap has an amazing cast, possibly the best cast assembled in many years. The two leads have sizzling chemistry and the actual story is amazing.BUT, the editing is just bad. This was not a long soap, it only went on a few weeks. I truly wish they would release the ENTIRE series on dvd, even if it's sold at a pricey cost. I'd definitely pay money to see the entire run.For someone who wants a taste of GREAT Mexican soaps, this is your chance. It has the GIST of the story, but I'm telling you it will leave you craving more.La Mentira, or the "Lie" is a tale of mistaken identity. Two cousins are given a broach with their initial, "V." Veronica is our heroine, played beautifully by Kate del Castillo. Her cousin, Virginia has enamored a young man and taken his money only to break his heart to the point of suicide. His brother wants revenge. He wants to court the woman who did this to his father. Instead of believing it to be Virginia, the true culprit he believes it was Veronica, who falls madly in love with him. The story continues and I won't spoil anymore.
summary: The Soap is 5 Stars, the DVD is lacking

reviewText: Lo compre como un regalo a mis hermanas. Pero en realidad es una historia que sale del contexto normal de las telenovelas en Mexico, tiene buena trama, las actuaciones son muy buenas y uno realmente se siente identificado con las situaciones de la novela.
Title: N/A

reviewText: this soap opera has everything -love,hate,deception,and great scenery and location. kate del castillo and guy ecker are fabulous together. and kate's father as her uncle is great too. the story is great as one cousin basically gets away with murder and kate's character is confused to be the one who did it, so guy ecker's character decides to get revenge, being as it is his brother was the one who died, by the cousin's lies and deceit.soon he finds himself in love with the supposed person who made his brother die, and he constantly tries to make himself hate kate's character, and the story is left with figuring everything out towards the end with lots of action as well. a must for the latin soap collector.
summary: kate del castillo at her finest, this is her best!
Title: N/A

reviewText: I was so HAPPY to finally see that LA MENTIRA was finally released on DVD.  Kate del Castillo and Guy Eckler have to be two of the best Spanish actors out there.  I love the edited form of novelas on DVD because they take out all the repetitive and added story lines and just get to the essential parts of the novelas.  I STRONGLY RECOMMEND THIS NOVELA!!!  YOU WILL ENJOY IT!!!  FINALLY they show a womans character that is strong, stubborn, and seeks what she wants.  Kate del Castillo brings forth a VERONICA that is trully admirable!!

reviewText: I love this Kate Del Castillo is awesome in this she does a great job I don't like old soap operas but this one I don't even see as a soap opera

reviewText: Me Gusto el Dvd, tiene un Buen Resumen con Lo Mas Importante de la Telenovela, las Mejores Escenas.No Contiene el Tema Principal de Vicente Fernandez Me Voy a Quitar de En Medio, tiene una Cancion Instrumental, que la verdad no me gusto mucho.Pese a eso esta Muy Bueno, Me Encanta la Actuacion de Karla Alvarez, hizo un Exelente Papel Antagonico y Kate del Castillo y Guy Ecker hacen una Exelente Pareja, es Muy Linda Novela, vale la pena Coleccionarla. La Recomiendo!!!
summary: Comentario sobre la Edicion en Dvd de La Mentira
